title: Patricia Breen Sèvres Saucer Santa Ornament
description:
Ornament developed from Sèvres Porcelain Manufactory’s Saucer, 1834, from the Art Institute of Chicago’s collection.

Inspired by the ornate and richly gilded detailing on Saucer by Sèvres Porcelain Manufactory (France, founded 1740).  Patricia Breen displays all the elegance and artistry she's known for on this limited edition ornament. Mouth-blown glass is hand-painted, hand-silvered and embellished with Austrian crystals.

  • Dimensions: 6.49 x 3.44 x 2.55 in.
  • Materials: Glass, Austrian crystals.
  • Hand painted, silvered.
  • Made in Poland.

*Please note: Discounts and promotional pricing do not apply.
